posts.post:
help me feel better
i don't understand why i feel so bad lately. i swear i was eating a little more than normal. i keep eating today because i just want to feel okay enough to get some fucking errands done. i feel so awful i keep eating shit and then waiting and waiting for it to hit my system and make me feel more awake but it won't happen. how much do i need to it??? i don't feel like eating more yet i have to keep making myself eat more but it won't help. i feel tired. i feel like i could fall asleep mid walking. i don't want to eat right now. i keep eating small amounts of different things but it's giving me anxiety bc it makes me feel like i am binging and as if i am not in control right now but that's not really true?? since i DONT actually really feel like eating right now and i am kind of making myself do it just because i really need to go to the store right now. i feel cold and like my head is being squeezed. i ran too much today probably. 8 miles. i don't want to eat too much and get a stomach ache right now. i don't want to feel too full or bloated. part of me thinks i should eat some junk food bc maybe i need it??? but then i don't want to get gas or anything and be uncomfortable??? can someone give me any advice at all. i have been absolutely tripping these past 48 hours i keep having to remind myself i am sober.
posts.Post Summary: The main self state in the post is maladaptive and is centered around the expectation that she will not be able to manage her food intake by herself, thus not fulfilling her competence needs. She feels desperate, as on one hand she criticizes herself when she eats claiming she binges, and then acts in a compensatory way and runs too much, self-harming herself. The adaptive self state is composed of the wish to receive help from others regarding her difficult struggle, and her relating behavior exhibited when asking for advice from others.

B-O.highlighted_evidence: can someone give me any advice at all

B-S.highlighted_evidence: i ran too much today probably. 8 miles.

C-S.highlighted_evidence: i don't want to eat right now. i keep eating small amounts of different things but it's giving me anxiety bc it makes me feel like i am binging and as if i am not in control

D.Category: (6) Expectation that competence needs will not be met
D.highlighted_evidence: i feel so awful i keep eating shit and then waiting and waiting for it to hit my system and make me feel more awake but it won't happen. how much do i need to it??? i don't feel like eating more yet i have to keep making myself eat more but it won't help. i feel tired.

posts.post:
im in survival mode please tip my scale
this weekend has been awful. i am sick. i am very weak. i have not been eating or sleeping enough and it has reached a point where im pretty sure i need to be hospitalized. i even ate more. friday and yesterday and today. i called off work friday and today. i have literally never done that once in my entire fucking life. i cannot help myself. i can't think straight. i keep thinking i should go to the hospital but i don't even know how i would get there. i don't think i can drive a car at all right now. i would call someone but i can't function enough to even do that. like i don't even know what i would say. i don't know what to say. i have no idea what is wrong with me or what has happened i keep thinking i may have been drugged i feel so incredibly fucked up. more fucked than times ive done shrooms and acid before i am literally in another dimension it is taking me so long to even make this post.   i think i am very close to death. like i think i could actually talk to god right now. if that makes sense. like i am barely even on this fucking planet. i feel like it is completely up to me whether i stay here or not. it is so surreal to be having this moment rn. you go your whole life wondering about your death and i think my moment is here. it is in my hands it is up to me. there is no other force with me no one is here to help me or tell me which one to pick. live or give up? i am so close i am 50/50 right now. i could go either way. my will to get better is not more than my will to give up. it just doesn't matter. and it is up to me. and it does not matter.
posts.Post Summary: The dominant self state in the post is a maladaptive one. it centers the depressive affect of the writer who sounds as if they slowly descend into psychosis. the writer views themselves critically  as incapable of helping themselves, as evident in the self neglect behavior showcased in their lack of eating or sleeping. the writer expects things to not matter as life doesn't matter. additionally, the writer is in freeze mode, unable to seek help from others, while maintaining a perception of others  as detached and unhelpful. the small adaptive self state in the post is centered around the desire to seek help as evident in his plea for help to tip their scale.

D.highlighted_evidence: im in survival mode please tip my scale

A.highlighted_evidence: live or give up? i am so close i am 50/50 right now. i could go either way.

B-S.highlighted_evidence: i have not been eating or sleeping enough and it has reached a point where im pretty sure i need to be hospitalized.

B-O.highlighted_evidence: i would call someone but i can't function enough to even do that. like i don't even know what i would say.

C-S.highlighted_evidence: i cannot help myself. i can't think straight.

C-O.Category: (2) Perception of the other as detached or over attached
C-O.highlighted_evidence: no one is here to help me or tell me which one to pick

D.Category: (6) Expectation that competence needs will not be met
D.highlighted_evidence: my will to get better is not more than my will to give up. it just doesn't matter

posts.post:
help me get to the hospital
this past week i have been so confused i think i need to go to the hospital. i don't want anyone to go with me because i am too scared and embarrassed i don't want to ask anyone i know about it so i am coming to reddit bc otherwise i will just continue to do nothing about it. idk how to even go to a doctor's appointment let alone a hospital let alone a psych ward. like i just got my own insurance for the first time. at my new job. i don't know if it has kicked in yet tho. i got hired in last month? or a month ago? idk. but like am i also still on my parents insurance too? i am a 21 yr old girl. would i be in the hospital overnight? multiple days? idk if that is convenient for me rn. i have two jobs. i never ever call off i called off at one on friday and the other on sunday. i don't want to take off any more time and i need to make money. would it cost me to go to the hospital ??? i am too broke. i dont know if it would be worth it to go. it's like im on acid but i didn't take acid so i kno that has to be serious. but at the same time i just want to ride this out and hope it goes away on it's own. just push thru the week and try to get a lot of sleep on saturday idk. idk how to go to the hospital idk where to go where to park what door to go into who to talk to what to say. i don't want anyone to find out. i don't know if it would be worth it at all i just want to give in and ride it out. ill either get better on my own or die and i really couldnt give a shit either way i dont know what to do
posts.Post Summary: The main self state in the post is maladaptive and centers around her great suffering, which she perceives as something huge that she cannot heal, as exhibited in her reluctance to go to the hospital because it might not be worth it. this reluctance is a fight or flight response to her not wanting anyone to know about her situation, as she views others as detached. the situation is so dire that she sounds disconnected, blunted and apathetic towards her fate, leading to self-neglect in the form of dealing with her severe situation on her own. The adaptive self-state is composed of the cry for help from others, showing a desire to get help in the form of motivation/advice to go to the hospital. she knows if she doesn't ask anyone she will do nothing about it, hence she behaves in this relating way. she is exhibiting self-care behavior in the form of working and getting insurance from the job so she can take care of herself.

B-S.highlighted_evidence: i just got my own insurance for the first time. at my new job.

B-O.highlighted_evidence: i don't want to ask anyone i know about it so i am coming to reddit bc otherwise i will just continue to do nothing about it

D.highlighted_evidence: help me get to the hospital

A.highlighted_evidence: ill either get better on my own or die and i really couldnt give a shit either way

B-S.highlighted_evidence: i just want to give in and ride it out

B-O.highlighted_evidence: i don't want anyone to find out. i don't know if it would be worth it at all

C-O.Category: (2) Perception of the other as detached or over attached
C-O.highlighted_evidence: i don't want anyone to go with me because i am too scared and embarrassed i don't want to ask anyone i know about it

D.Category: (6) Expectation that competence needs will not be met
D.highlighted_evidence: i dont know if it would be worth it to go

posts.post:
i binge ate
i didn't eat all day. and then before bed i binge ate. i am worried i will feel sick in the morning. that is not how i want to start my week. i swear i wasn't even hungry. i don't know why i did it. i am sad.
posts.Post Summary: The main self state in the post is maladaptive. it centers the binge eating behavior of the writer, that leads them to a self critical perception of themselves, and to feel depressed. the adaptive self state is composed of the desire to avoid the feeling of sickness.

D.highlighted_evidence: i am worried i will feel sick in the morning.

B-S.highlighted_evidence: i didn't eat all day. and then before bed i binge ate

C-S.highlighted_evidence: i swear i wasn't even hungry. i don't know why i did it.

posts.post:
has jim davis responded to the memes?
[removed]

in my shit over a beatles song please rescue
23F, grew up listening to the beatles. been a few years since i listened to them, been on a kick lately. today i heard In My Life for the first time in a minute and really listened to the lyrics for once.......... bro. aw i cried. i feel like i never paid close enough attention to that song or something and now it's like i'm hearing it for rhe first time?? it's literally the cutest, most charming, wholesome lil song. so beautiful holy shit. and now it's been stuck in my head all night, and putting me in my shit. i pictured a band playing a cover of it for someone's first dance and im WRECKED alright. picture that shit !!!!! fuck the emotions that song brings me are too much i wanna die lmao !!!! too much wholesomeness and nostalgia as well im gonna explode. go listen to this song to refresh your memory and cry with me pleaseee
posts.Post Summary: The self state in the post is adaptive and centers her relatedness desire, exhibited in her sharing her experience and encouraging others to engage with her (showing relatable behavior). she is feeling emotional adaptive pain as a result of hearing this song and listening to it's lyrics closely.

A.highlighted_evidence: today i heard In My Life for the first time in a minute and really listened to the lyrics for once.......... bro. aw i cried

B-O.highlighted_evidence: go listen to this song to refresh your memory and cry with me pleaseee

D.highlighted_evidence: go listen to this song to refresh your memory and cry with me pleaseee

posts.post:
my hair
i just put my hair up for the first time in a while. i know it's just hair. but the devestation i feel right now is surreal. it's unreal. i have no idea how to fix it. i'm too scared to google it. i am assuming there isn't anything you can do. please don't tell me anything negative. i am so sad. i am crying like a little girl. this is a completely new kind of sadness.
posts.Post Summary: The main self state in the post is maladaptive and centers the writer's  self criticism, as they feel devastated by their bad hairdo. it makes them feel depressed. she is so depressed she is unable to help herself and google ideas to fix it, blocking her potential to get better. the writer expects others to not be able to help them, and pleads them to be forgiving and not roast her as she perceives them as detached, with the ability to hurt her. the adaptive self state is composed of the desire for others to make her feel better about herself and her hair.

D.highlighted_evidence: please don't tell me anything negative

timeline_summary: The self states in the post are dominantly maladaptive. that being said, for every dominantly maladaptive post, even the hardest ones, there was always a small, less present adaptive self state present. Additionally, towards the end of the timeline there were posts with adaptive self states on their own. It seems the writer's extreme moods make it hard for the adaptive self state  to become more present when the maladaptive self state is wrecking havoc, and allows it to become more present only when it is present alone as seen through the latter half of the timeline.
